translation.welcomeTitle: Hello! How can I assist you today?
translation.welcomeSubtitle: I am an AI assistant from the Mukdahan Provincial Public Health Office.
translation.welcomeUploadSupported: Supported formats: Images, Videos, and documents (.pdf, .docx, .txt, etc.)
suggestedQuestions: What are the symptoms of dengue fever?
I have a headache and a fever, what could it be?
Book an appointment with a dentist for next Friday morning.
Schedule my allergy pill for every day at 8 PM for the next 30 days.
How do I apply for a health certificate?
Create a 3-day healthy meal plan for me.
Estimate the calories from a photo of my meal
translation.capabilityDocDesc: Ask questions about uploaded images, videos, or documents.
translation.capabilityFoodDesc: Estimate calories from a photo of your meal.
translation.capabilityVoiceDesc: Control the app with your voice.
translation.recommendSystem: Recommend a healthy lunch menu for me
translation.recommendSystemPrompt: Recommend a healthy lunch menu for me
translation.welcomeMessage: Hello! I am your Public Health AI Assistant. How can I help you today?
translation.locationError: Could not get your location. Please enable location services.
translation.docConfirmTitle: Start a new chat with this file?
translation.docConfirmMessage: This will create a new conversation based on '{{fileName}}'.
translation.toastUnsupportedFile: File '{{fileName}}' has an unsupported file type.
translation.toastUnsupportedFileForNewChat: Cannot start a new chat. This file type is not supported.
translation.emergencyModalApiError: Could not contact the emergency service API. Please check your connection or use the numbers below.
translation.emergencyModalLocationError: Could not get your location for SOS. Please enable location services and try again.
translation.toastNotInLiveMode: This command only works in Live mode.
translation.inputPlaceholder: Ask me anything, or type 'generate image of...' or 'create video of...'
translation.sidebarFeatureInfo: This feature is available in '{{feature}}' mode. Switch modes to see other content.
translation.modelProDesc: Most capable for complex reasoning and deep analysis.
translation.tooltipKnowledgeBase: Allow the AI to use your uploaded documents to answer questions.
translation.tooltipSearch: Use Google Search for up-to-date information.
translation.tooltipLocation: Provide location for relevant results (e.g., Maps).
translation.tooltipClinic: Allow the AI to find local health clinics.
translation.tooltipSymptomChecker: Allow the AI to analyze symptoms and provide general advice (not a diagnosis).
translation.tooltipMedicationReminder: Allow the AI to set single medication reminders using browser notifications.
translation.tooltipMedicationScheduler: Allow the AI to set up and manage recurring medication schedules.
translation.tooltipAppointmentBooking: Allow the AI to book medical appointments.
translation.tooltipUserProfile: Allow the AI to remember details from your conversation for a personalized experience.
translation.tooltipIsanDialect: Make the AI speak in the local Isan dialect.
translation.personaModalBody: Provide custom instructions for the AI to follow in its responses. This will apply to the current conversation.
translation.personaModalPlaceholder: e.g., 'You are a friendly assistant who explains medical terms in simple language.'
translation.apiKeyModalBody1: Video generation requires a user-provided API key.
translation.apiKeyModalBody2: Please select a key to proceed. For information on billing, see the
translation.liveApiKeyErrorInitial: This feature requires a user-provided API key with the 'AI Native Audio' API enabled.
translation.liveApiKeyErrorInvalid: Invalid API Key. Please select a key with the 'AI Native Audio' API enabled.
translation.liveCameraError: Could not access camera. Please check permissions.
translation.errorQuotaExceeded: API quota exceeded. Please check your billing or try again later.
translation.errorImageSafety: The request was blocked due to safety policies. Please adjust your prompt.
translation.toastVoiceUnrecognized: Sorry, I didn't understand that command.
translation.voiceCommandDescNewChat: Starts a new, empty conversation or chat session.
translation.voiceCommandDescReadLastMessage: Reads the last response from the AI assistant out loud.
translation.voiceCommandDescSetDarkMode: Switches the user interface to dark mode or dark theme.
translation.voiceCommandDescSetLightMode: Switches the user interface to light mode or light theme.
translation.voiceCommandDescToggleCamera: Opens or closes the camera view. This is only available in the live conversation mode.
translation.voiceCommandDescAnalyzeImage: Captures a frame from the camera and asks the AI to analyze it. This is only available in the live conversation mode when the camera is on.
translation.voiceCommandDescSwitchToLive: Switches the user interface to the live conversation mode, usually to prepare for using the camera.
translation.sharedFooterTitle: Experience the Public Health AI Assistant
translation.sharedFooterBody: This is a shared conversation. Create your own account to start new chats, upload documents, and more.
translation.analyzerSubtitle: Upload an image of your lab report to get a simplified explanation of your results.
translation.analyzerUploadPrompt: Drop your health report image here, or click to browse files.
translation.analyzerDisclaimerBody: This AI analysis is for informational purposes only and is NOT a substitute for professional medical advice, diagnosis, or treatment. Always consult with a qualified healthcare provider for any health concerns.
translation.analyzerError: Could not analyze the report. The image might be unclear or the format may not be supported. Please try again with a clearer picture.
translation.analyzerErrorFileSize: File is too large. Please select a file smaller than {{maxSize}}.
translation.analyzerErrorInvalidFile: Invalid file type. Please upload an image.
translation.analyzerToastMultipleFiles: Multiple files detected. Only the first file will be analyzed.
translation.hubSubtitle: Latest health news and announcements for you, powered by AI.
translation.hubError: Could not fetch health news. Please try again later.
translation.dashboardSubtitle: Your personal health history. Track your analyzed reports over time.
translation.dashboardError: Could not load health records. Please try again.
translation.dashboardEmptyBody: After you analyze a health report in the 'Analyzer' tab, you can save it here to track your history.
translation.dashboardSavePrompt: Enter a title for this report (e.g., Annual Checkup 2024):
translation.dashboardSaveDisabledTooltip: Sign in to save reports to your dashboard.
translation.dashboardDeleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this health record? This action cannot be undone.
translation.dashboardChartNoData: Not enough data to display a trend. At least two reports with the same metric are needed.
translation.dashboardChartNoMetrics: No trackable metrics found in your saved reports.
translation.dashboardNoVitals: No key metrics found in your latest report to summarize.
translation.dashboardAiSummaryError: Could not generate an AI summary at this time.
translation.mapSubtitle: Find health services and information in your area.
translation.mapSearchPlaceholder: Search for clinics, hospitals, or health alerts...
translation.mapNoResults: No results found for your query.
translation.mapError: An error occurred while searching. Please try again.
translation.mapInitialMessage: Use the search bar above to find health-related places and information near you.
translation.dashboardMedicationScheduleDeleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this medication schedule? All future reminders for it will be cancelled.
translation.profileSubtitle: Here is what the AI remembers about you. You can edit or remove any information.
translation.profileSignInPromptTitle: Sign In to Use Your Profile
translation.profileSignInPromptBody: Sign in with your Google account to allow the AI to remember your preferences and create a personalized experience.
translation.nutritionSubtitle: Track your daily meals and nutritional intake with AI.
translation.nutritionUploadPrompt: Drop a food photo here, or click to browse.
translation.nutritionTextPlaceholder: Describe your meal (e.g., 'A bowl of chicken noodle soup with a side of toast').
translation.wellnessSubtitle: Take a moment for your mental well-being. Check in with yourself.
translation.wellnessBreathingInstruction: Breathe in... Hold... Breathe out... Hold...
translation.pharmacySubtitle: Identify medications and manage your medicine cabinet with AI.
translation.pharmacyUploadPrompt: Take a photo of a pill, bottle, or package to identify it.
translation.pharmacyAlreadyExists: This medication is already in your cabinet.
translation.pharmacyCabinetEmpty: Your cabinet is empty. Scan a medication to add it.
translation.familySubtitle: Monitor the health of your loved ones.
translation.skinSubtitle: Take a photo of a skin condition for preliminary AI assessment.
translation.skinUploadPrompt: Upload a photo of your skin here
translation.plannerSubtitle: Generate personalized health plans with AI.
translation.plannerPrompt: Let AI design a plan tailored to your health data, goals, and preferences.
